'''Dana''' is an [[NPC]] located in [[Pardis Dhyai]], [[Sumeru]]. He is a member of [[Amurta]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Padisarah]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Dana:''' Days feel like years while I wait for this...
:{{DIcon}} What are you waiting for?
::'''Dana:''' An outcome that will decide my future!
::'''Dana:''' ...It's my application to remain in school after graduation.
::'''Dana:''' I heard the competition to join the Akademiya has been growing in intensity. People are giving recommendations to [[Kemia|Ms. Kemia]] every day. I wonder if I still have a chance...
::'''Dana:''' No, I must stay confident. Based on the results of my final paper, I still have quite the advantage.
::{{DIcon}} Tell me about your results...
::'''Dana:''' It was on [[Padisarah]].
::'''Dana:''' Do you know that there are very few plantations of Padisarah due to its harsh requirements for the environment?
::'''Dana:''' If it's possible to develop a stabler variety, then it'll be able to greatly improve the efficiency of growing Padisarah.
::'''Dana:''' I proposed quite an effective solution in my graduation paper. If I can stay in school and continue my research after graduation, I'm certain that I'll be able to make a bigger breakthrough.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Sounds like a plan.
:::'''Dana:''' Hearing you say this, I feel a bit more relieved.
:::'''Dana:''' Anyway, I've done the best I could, now it's all up to destiny.
:::'''Dana:''' By the way, these are the Padisarah I cultivated during my research.
:::'''Dana:''' Smells amazing, right? Please take them as a gift. I just hope all our wishes will come true.
::;(Obtain [[Padisarah]] ×4)
:{{DIcon}} See you.
;(Before completing [[Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies]])
::'''Dana:''' Greater Lord Rukkhadevata, please let my application get approved...
;(After completing Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies)
::'''Dana:''' O great Dendro Archon, please let my application receive approval...
{{Dialogue end}}
